text: Benedek Váradi (born 5 February 1995) is a Hungarian professional basketball player for Falco KC of the national Nemzeti Bajnokság I/A league and the international Basketball Champions League. ==Professional career== Váradi has been the team captain of his club Falco KC, which he led to the Championship of the 2018–19 Nemzeti Bajnokság I/A season. ==National team== Váradi has been a member of the Hungarian national basketball team.Férfi kosár NB I: „Nagyon nehéz szituációban vagyunk” GYŐRI FERENC (Nemzeti Sport), 16 March 2020. Accessed 2 May 2020. At the EuroBasket 2022 qualification, Hungary surprisingly defeated defending Champion Slovenia 77-75. Váradi labelled the victory as "among the most important" in his career.Elképesztő kosárcsoda: a magyar válogatott legyőzte az Eb-címvédőt Antalics Ádám (ORIOGO), 20 February 2020. Accessed 11 May 2020. ==References== ==External links== *Basketball Champions League profile *Profile at RealGM.com *Profile at Eurobasket.com Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Guards (basketball) Category:Hungarian men's basketball players Category:Sportspeople from Szombathely
title: Benedek Váradi
